summary: Three men case a small town very carefully, with plans to rob the bank on the upcoming Saturday, which turns violent and deadly.
cast: Victor Mature|Richard Egan|Stephen McNally|Virginia Leith|Tommy Noonan|Lee Marvin|Margaret Hayes|J. Carrol Naish|Sylvia Sidney|Ernest Borgnine|Dorothy Patrick|Billy Chapin|Brad Dexter|Robert Adler|John Alderson|Ellen Bowers|Virginia Carroll|Harry Carter|Kevin Corcoran|Noreen Corcoran|Ralph Dumke|Donald Gamble|Richard Garrick|Raymond Greenleaf|Robert Ivers|Helen Mayon|Boyd 'Red' Morgan|Ann Morrison|Richey Murray|Joyce Newhard|Sammy Ogg|Robert Osterloh|Dorothy Phillips|Florence Ravenel|Harry Seymour|Fred Shellac|Esther Somers|Jeri Weil|Pat Weil|Mack Williams
title: Sábado trágico
